newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE sugar higher and active, but volume inflated.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE sugar higher and active, but volume inflated.

text.p: LIFFE sugar rose in active trading Thursday although the apparent volume was much inflated by switches and trade against actuals.
"There's no real news," one trader said. Most of today's activity was driven by market players selling into expiry, he said, referring to the expiry of the May contract.
By around 1500 GMT there were some 800 AA trades and 500 spreads included in the total volume, the trader said. "The rest is trade to trade business, he said.
Total volume by 1504 GMT was 2,859 lots, of which 2,140 were on May, which was $1.80 higher at $309.90, off a high of $310.20
Some short covering helped the market to rise earlier in the day and it had held on well to the higher levels reached, the trader said.
